:label.description: The content to display as the label.
:label.description_zh: The content to display as the label.

color.type: default | primary | secondary | success | warning | danger

:valueLabel.description: The content to display as the value's label (e.g. 1 of 4).
:valueLabel.description_zh: The content to display as the value's label (e.g. 1 of 4).

:minValue.description: The smallest value allowed for the input.
:minValue.description_zh: The smallest value allowed for the input.

:maxValue.description: The largest value allowed for the input.
:maxValue.description_zh: The largest value allowed for the input.

:formatOptions.description: The options to format the value.
:formatOptions.description_zh: The options to format the value.

showValueLabel.description: Whether to show the value label.
showValueLabel.description_zh: Whether to show the value label.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the progress slots.
classNames.description_zh: Allows to set custom class names for the progress slots.

slots.name: base
slots.description: The base slot of the progress, it is the main container.
slots.description_zh: The base slot of the progress, it is the main container.

slots.name: labelWrapper
slots.description: The label and value label wrapper.
slots.description_zh: The label and value label wrapper.

slots.name: value
slots.description: The value label of the progress.
slots.description_zh: The value label of the progress.

slots.name: track
slots.description: The track is the background bar of the progress.
slots.description_zh: The track is the background bar of the progress.

slots.name: indicator
slots.description: The indicator is the bar that is filled according to the value.
slots.description_zh: The indicator is the bar that is filled according to the value.
